results.title: Role of metformin and other metabolic drugs in the prevention and therapy of endocrine-related cancers.
results.text_hl: Role of @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ and other metabolic drugs in the prevention and therapy of @<m>DISEASE_Endocrine_Gland_Neoplasms</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D004701 @@@endocrine-related cancers@@@.

citations.NLM: León-González AJ, Jiménez-Vacas JM, Fuentes-Fayos AC, Sarmento-Cabral A, Herrera-Martínez AD, Gahete MD, Luque RM. Role of metformin and other metabolic drugs in the prevention and therapy of endocrine-related cancers. Curr Opin Pharmacol. 2021 Oct;60():17-26. PMID: 34311387

results.title: The prevalence of secondary neoplasms in acromegalic patients: possible preventive and/or protective role of metformin
results.text_hl: @GENE_INS @GENE_3630 @@@Insulin@@@ has a mitogenic effect through its interaction with the @GENE_IGF1R @GENE_3480 @@@IGF-1 receptor@@@ (@GENE_IGF1R @GENE_3480 @@@IGF-1R@@@) that also binds @GENE_IGF1 @GENE_3479 @@@IGF-1@@@. On the other hand, @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@, an anti-@DISEASE_Hyperglycemic_Hyperosmolar_Nonketotic_Coma @DISEASE_MESH:D006944 @@@hyperglycemic@@@ drug that decreases serum levels of @GENE_INS @GENE_3630 @@@insulin@@@ and @GENE_IGF1 @GENE_3479 @@@IGF-1@@@, could have a protective role in the treatment of @<m>DISEASE_Endocrine_Gland_Neoplasms</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D004701 @@@endocrine tumors@@@.

citations.NLM: Costa D, Ceccato F, Lauretta R, Mercuri V, D'Amico T, De Vito C, Scaroni C, Appetecchia M, Gargiulo P. The prevalence of secondary neoplasms in acromegalic patients: possible preventive and/or protective role of metformin Int J Clin Oncol. 2021 Jun;26(6):1015-1021. PMID: 33713207

results.title: Integrated or Independent Actions of Metformin in Target Tissues Underlying Its Current Use and New Possible Applications in the Endocrine and Metabolic Disorder Area
results.text_hl: Recent evidence either supporting or challenging the potential use of @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ to treat @<m>DISEASE_Endocrine_Gland_Neoplasms</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D004701 @@@endocrine tumors@@@ is discussed.

results.title: Cellular and Molecular Evidence of the Synergistic Antitumour Effects of Hydroxytyrosol and Metformin in Prostate Cancer.
results.text_hl: Hence, some metabolic drugs like @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ have emerged as potential anti-@DISEASE_Neoplasms @DISEASE_MESH:D009369 @@@tumour@@@ agents against several @<m>DISEASE_Endocrine_Gland_Neoplasms</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D004701 @@@endocrine-related cancers@@@.

citations.NLM: Porcel-Pastrana F, Montero-Hidalgo AJ, G-García ME, Gil-Duque I, Prats-Escribano A, Gahete MD, Sarmento-Cabral A, Luque RM, León-González AJ. results.title: The role of an anti-diabetic drug metformin in the treatment of endocrine tumors.
results.text_hl: The role of an anti-@DISEASE_Diabetes_Mellitus @DISEASE_MESH:D003920 @@@diabetic drug@@@ @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ in the treatment of @<m>DISEASE_Endocrine_Gland_Neoplasms</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D004701 @@@endocrine tumors@@@.

results.title: Endocrine-related cancers and the role of AMPK.
results.text_hl: This review also presents data relating to the role of @GENE_PRKAB1 @GENE_5564 @@@AMPK@@@ in @DISEASE_Ovarian_Neoplasms @DISEASE_MESH:D010051 @@@cancers of the endometrium, ovary and colon@@@, and discusses the possible use of @GENE_PRKAB1 @GENE_5564 @@@AMPK@@@-activating drugs including @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ for the treatment of all @<m>DISEASE_Endocrine_Gland_Neoplasms</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D004701 @@@endocrine-related cancers@@@.

citations.NLM: Brown KA, Samarajeewa NU, Simpson ER. Endocrine-related cancers and the role of AMPK. Mol Cell Endocrinol. 2013 Feb 25;366(2):170-9. PMID: 22801104
